variable_description: With respect to your Parkinson's disease condition, how would you describe yourself now compared with your last study visit?
Have you had depression?
Did you receive treatment for your depression?
Did your depression limit your activities?
Have you had anxiety?
Did you receive treatment for your anxiety?
Did your anxiety limit your activities?
Has a Physician diagnosed you with this condition
Have you had depression?
On average, how many hours per day did you enage in sitting activities?
Walking activities: Over the past 7 days, how often did you take a walk outside your home or yard for any reason? For example, for fun or exercise, walking to work, walking the dog etc.?
On average, how many hours per day did you spend walking

Light sport and recreational activities: Over the past 7 days, how often did you engage in light sport or recreational activities such as bowling, gold with a cart, shuffleboard, fishing from a boat or pier or other similar activities?
On average, how many hours per day did you engage in these light sport or recreational activities?

Moderate sport and recreational activities: Over the past 7 days, how often did you engage in moderate sport recreational activities such as doubles tennis, ballroom dancing, hunting, ice skating, gold without a care, softball or other similar activities?
On average, how many hours per day did you engage in these moderate sport and recreational activities?

Strenuous sport and recreational activities: Over the past 7 days, how often did you engage in strenuous sport activities such as jogging, swimming, cycling, singles tennis, aerobic dance, skiiing (downhill or cross country) or other similar activities?
On average, how many hours per day did you engage in these strenuous sport and recreational activities?
Muscle strength: Over the past 7 days, how often did you do exercise specifically to increase muscle strength and endurance, such as lifting weights or push-ups etc.?
On average, how many hours per day did you engage in exercise to increase muscle strength and endurance?
Household activity: During the past 7 days, have you done any light housework, such as dusting or washing dishes?
Household activity: During the past 7 days, have you done any heavy housework or chores such as vacuuming, scrubbing floors, washing windows, or carrying wood?
Household activity: During the past 7 days, did you engage in home repairs like painting, wallpapering, electrical work etc.?
Household activity: During the past 7 days, did you engage in lawn work or yard care, including snow or leaf removal, wood chopping, etc.?
Household activity: During the past 7 days, did you engage in outdoor gardening?
Household activity: During the past 7 days, did you engage in caring for another person, such as children, dependent, spouse, or another adult?
Work-Related Activity: During the past 7 days, did you work for pay or as a volunteer?
Which of the following categories best describes the amount of physical activity required on your job and/or volunteer work?
Mobility
Self-care
Usual activties
Pain/discomfort
Anxiety/depression
